snippet: HBO has apologized for a scene in its hit fantasy series "Game of Thrones" that showed the decapitated head of former President George W. Bush on a pike and said the scene will be removed from future DVD releases.
abstract: HBO has apologized for a scene in its hit fantasy series "Game of Thrones" that showed the decapitated head of former President George W. Bush on a pike and said the scene will be removed from future DVD releases.

headline.main: HBO Apologizes for Bush Head in 'Game of Thrones' DVD
